Key Match Events: Haliburton recorded a triple-double with 33 points, 15 assists, and 6 three-pointers without a turnover
The Pacers led 38-25 after the first quarter and 66-50 at halftime
The Pacers outscored the Heat 28-25 in the second quarter and 41-24 in the third quarter
Indiana's lead ballooned to 107-83 in the third quarter
The Heat closed the gap to 12 points midway through the fourth quarter but failed to mount a comeback
